BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.consistencycheck.ConsistencyCheckJob has a circular dependency with other classes
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.consistencycheck.api.impl.ConsistencyCheckJobAPI.buildIgnoredTableInfo(String[], Map) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.consistencycheck.api.impl.ConsistencyCheckJobAPI.getJobItemInfo(String) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.consistencycheck.api.impl.ConsistencyCheckJobAPI.getJobItemInfo(String) converts String to boxed primitive using excessive boxing

Method new org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.scenario.consistencycheck.context.ConsistencyCheckJobItemContext(ConsistencyCheckJobConfiguration, int, JobStatus, ConsistencyCheckJobItemProgress) uses immediate execution of a block of code that is often not used
